name: Pegafuerte el terrible
description:
You are a man with a mission: shoot the aliens that are trying to take over the world and rescue your little town "the powerful candle"

Side scrolling platform game, similar to "Metal Slug", single player, offline, linear progression, no exploration required. Many checkpoints and varied levels.

With your weapon you will have to shoot the enemies, do double jumps and run fast to finish each level, and defeat the boss of each world.
